notes: At this time, only constraint type "csys" is fully supported.

data.name: type
data.valid_values: align, auto, csys, def_placement, edge_on_srf, fix, insert, mate, orient, pnt_on_line, pnt_on_srf, substitute, tangent

data.name: asmdatum
data.description: Datum side on the assembly (for appropriate constraint types)

data.name: compdatum
data.description: Datum side on the component (for appropriate constraint types)

data.name: offset
data.description: Offset from the assembly reference (for appropriate constraint types)
